segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so high, and that stool looks like it's about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel my heart racing, hoping he doesn't fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got a plate in one hand, trying to catch the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the determination on his face, but it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is waiting for a cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why they didn't just ask for the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed, and it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the woman hasn't noticed them yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking it, balancing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get the cookies quickly and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet doors frame him, like a picture of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR
